page.title: 01Weybridge and Hersham Area
page.content: Our area is in the South East of England.It is 18 miles(29 Km) S.W. of London. The area is mostly residential and is served by the Southern Region railway which goes to{Waterloo. The area covers{Weybridge, Hersham and {Whiteley Village.}Whiteley Village is a place for old people, purpose built by a man called{William Whiteley.} Running through our territory is the{ {River Mole. Also included in it are golf courses and several open spaces. It is a very expensive area in which to be and quite a few famous people live here. There are shops, a few small factories, several schools, a geriatric hospital, a health centre,a large cemetry and lots of churches. .
